item.title: How About That Weather!? - An EDA of Climate Change in Berlin.
item.description: Introduction Data Import and Preparation Importing Tidying Visualizing Climate Change in Berlin Average Annual Temperature Change: Berlin Average Annual Temperature: Global vs. Local Proportion of +25°C Days Sunshine Precipitation Days Without Precipitation Air Pressure Conclusion Introduction The following exploratory data analysis of climate change in Berlin represents a first step in bringing this often abstract issue closer to home. Why is this necessary?
